  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DESIGNATED RESPONDER FOUND SAID PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR AND IT APPEARD TO BE LEAKING. RESPONDER PLACED SAID PACKAGE INTO SPILL TRAY. CLEANED AREA OF CONTAMINATED DEBRIS. RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING

item.title: Report X-2024090504
item.description:
Report X-2024090504

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A SORTER, WHILE SORTING ON THE GREY SECONDARY, ENCOUNTERED A PACKAGE WITH HAZ MAT MARKINGS THE APPEARED TO BE LEAKING FROM INSIDE. A RESPONDER WAS CALLED AND THE PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, THE BOX WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN FOUR 5 LITER BOTTLES OF DECK STRIPPER, EACH WITH A LOOSE CAP. THE PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED PER PROPER DMP PROCEDURES.

item.title: Report X-2024090291
item.description:
Report X-2024090291

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-29
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER INFORMED OF A LEAKING PAZMAT IN PAPACKAGE CAR ON THE METRO LINE. ON ARRIVAL FOUND A HAZMAT PACKAGE WITH CLASS 5.1 AND 8 DIAMOND HAZARD LABELS. THE PACKAGE HAD ALREADY BEEN CONTAINERIZED AND THE LEAKED CONTENTS CLEANED UP BY THE ON ROAD HAZMAT RESPONDER.
